Package edu.depauw.csc232.solitaire.ui

Class Pile

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.depauw.csc232.solitaire.ui.CardStack
      • edu.depauw.csc232.solitaire.ui.Pile
  • public class Pile
extends CardStack
    A Pile is a CardStack located on a game Table. It has a PileStrategy to be able to respond to mouse clicks and drag/drop events.
    Author:
    bhoward

      • tryDrag

        public boolean tryDrag​(Pile origin,
                       int numCards,
                       CardMover mover)
        Programmatically try to drag the given number of cards from the origin to this Pile. Use the given CardMover to move the cards.
